content.description: Start low on the tufa and move straight and left on the main tufa to a slopey top out.
content.location: Right and up from The Detangler

content.description: Climb the arete to the long slab above. Great compression climbing with a poor landing, more work could be done or if you wait for snow fields to be there it is perfect. Start with left hand on the arete and right hand on a side pull crimp out right, squat/sit start. Beware of the slab above and that it is sandstone climbing, a fall from the slab above could be very bad.
content.location: Park your car where you can see this boulder.

content.description:
The Detangler block is found adjacent to three big boulders that create a cave underneath them. If you find that pile move right and you'll find a long block that could have many lines on it. Identified by some tufas on the right side and big undercling fangs.

The detangler starts right had on side pull, left hand on crimp, move up and left on crimps to a slopey top out.
content.location: The Detangler block is found adjacent to three big boulders that create a cave underneath them. If you find that pile move right and you'll find a long block that could have many lines on it. Identified by some tufas on the right side and big undercling fangs.
